barrier_o.name: Barrier O
barrier_o.desc: Tiny shield to make combat easier. Regenerates fully after every battle.

barrier_alpha.name: Barrier Alpha
barrier_alpha.desc: Strong protection and excellent regeneration, but pricey.

barrier_beta.name: Barrier Beta
barrier_beta.desc: Second tier protection. Not very fast at regenerating, but very protective.

barrier_gamma.name: Barrier Gamma
barrier_gamma.desc: Strong shield for medium ships. Intended to block big hits.

barrier_delta.name: Barrier Delta
barrier_delta.desc: Cruiser-grade protection. Meant to withstand a volley of enemy fire.

barrier_epsilon.name: Barrier Epsilon
barrier_epsilon.desc: Very large shield for very large ships. Strong protection, but liable to run out in prolonged battles.
